meanings.definition: Using photography in the process of mechanical reproduction.
meanings.sent1: The photomechanically printed images were clear and detailed.
meanings.sent2: The artist created a photomechanically reproduced copy of the original painting.
meanings.sent3: The photomechanically produced posters were so precise that they looked like real photographs.
meanings.sent4: Her photomechanically enhanced drawings seemed to leap off the page.
meanings.sent5: The photomechanically altered pictures had a unique and modern feel.

meanings.definition: In a manner related to the combination of photography and mechanical processes.
meanings.sent1: She adjusted the camera settings photomechanically to capture the perfect shot.
meanings.sent2: The machine operated photomechanically, ensuring consistent results.
meanings.sent3: The robot moved photomechanically, mimicking human gestures in a funny way.
meanings.sent4: The gears in the clock turned photomechanically, ticking away the seconds.
meanings.sent5: The car engine hummed photomechanically, smoothly propelling the vehicle forward.
